text: my name is Charlie I'm a Solutions
Architect in the AWS justice and public
safety team the job of my team is to
help the public safety community to
understand how they can do today's
technology to help them keep the public
safe if I had to explain my job in its
simplest terms it's like working with
Lego I listen to customers problems
listen to their opportunities and use
virtual building blocks to help them
build cool models to sell cool problems
that's what I look forward to every day
working with my customers on challenging
business problems that lets me get
creative with technology if people ask
me for advice about joining AWS the
thing that I would say is think about
the customers that you want to help
that's the thing that motivates me the
most and helps us make history AWS
public-sector is paving the way for
innovation and supporting world-changing
projects in government education and
nonprofit organizations if you believe
in turning can't be done into done come
with the future with us apply today
